data.name: Parallax Demo
data.detailed_description:
Description

Parallax is a first-person puzzle game with two overlapping worlds. Weave back and forth between black and white as you try to be in the right place, in the right dimension, at the right time. Use switches, boosters and gravity to help you reach the exit. This demo contains the introductory chapter of the game.

data.short_description: Parallax is a first-person puzzle game with two overlapping worlds. Weave back and forth between black and white as you try to be in the right place, in the right dimension, at the right time. Use switches, boosters and gravity to help you reach the exit. This demo contains the introductory chapter of the game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
